channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on FinanClub

item.title: TSM
item.description: score:1084 Chances: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. (TSMC) expected to approve construction of a â‚¬10 billion facility in Dresden, Germany. TSMC’s leading position as the world’s top contract chip manufacturer makes it an intriguing investment. Growing trend of artificial intelligence (AI) and TSMC’s involvement in chip production for AI applications.

item.title: AI
item.description: score:1021 Chances: Shares of AI software company C3.ai (NYSE: AI) experienced a 7% decline after analysts raised concerns about AI stocks being in a potential bubble. C3.ai’s shift to a consumption-based business model for fiscal 2024 may help lower entry barriers for new customers and quickly strike deals.

item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:1056 Chances: Palantir’s AI platform, launched in April, is gaining traction with over 100 organizations and talks with more than 300 additional companies. Palantir raised its annual revenue forecast and announced a $1 billion stock buyback plan, indicating confidence in its growth prospects.

item.title: MU
item.description: score:1077 Chances: Micron Technology is expanding its CXL ecosystem by offering sample availability of the Micron CZ120 memory expansion modules, which could contribute to revenue growth. The CZ120 modules’ high capacities and memory read/write bandwidth could position Micron to meet the increasing demand for advanced memory solutions in data-intensive applications.
